__e: I called because I was going out of my head in solitary.
If solitude's your thing, you came to the right place.
Nobody has told me how much solitude is needed to know what is loneliness
In life all you get for participating is pain, loneliness and death.
You mean, besides work, loneliness and death?
I mean, I remember feeling angry and alone and doing all those things, but...
It's something I do every year before the show is come here and kind of, for the last time, enjoy the solitude of what I call a blank canvas.
Are you less lonely because you can sit in the garden?
